alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 4:02PM EDT until July 16 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Connecticut, including the following county, Windham. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low water crossings may become inundated with water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 357 PM EDT, Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. The Quinebaug river at Quinebaug is at flood stage and rising. Additional rainfall is expected through this evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Southbridge, Putnam, Thompson, Woodstock and Pomfret. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
